Only time that's OK is if they hadn't really know each other before hand.
But you can't be in love with the guy, give him chocolates, understand he's the dense type, not say anything even when he's graduating and then give up on him. Only to become a huge slut that fucks and sucks every guy bareback.
Then when he comes back you take his v-card, confess you USED to like him, find out his Dicks great and then try to look wholesome agian...nope sorry. Only the Lord of the Simps could be that pathetic.
